name: Demon Insignia
description:
It's a turn-based card battler.

How to play:

Click on the card you want to play. You pay by discarding other cards from your hand until its cost (blue circle) is paid. Summon creatures or shoot Arrows at enemy Units.

Clear all enemies and you can attack their leader directly.

Units have 3 Stats:  Attack (Yellow),  Life (Red), and Magic (Violet).

Attacks deal damage and the target hits the attacker back. Basic attack Damage is subtracted directly from life. The Magic stat behaves differently:

Magic (Violet) damage cancel each other and Only the stronger Magic-user is dealing the difference in damage.

Win by reducing the life points of the enemy Leader. Don't let the demons get you!

I hope to add more content and a roguelike-deckbuilding mechanic in the future!
Thank you for your interest!
Be healthy...
